data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What do you think is the most important quality for a leader to have? Explain the reasons for your choice.
data.answer: From my point of view, emotional intelligence is the most important quality for a good leader. Personally, leaders with high emotional intelligence tend to control their emotions, which prevents negative emotions from influencing their decision making. Commonly, they have a great understanding of team members' feeling and know how to unite a team together. A good team leader can also motivate team members so that they can work their best. Meanwhile, he or she knows how to resolve the conflict within the team smoothly. A team leader who really cares about members will cause a sense of belongings, which can contribute to the efficiency. (104字)
